john lewis tells some head office staff: John Lewis has announced a new policy requiring its head office staff, specifically in the commercial teams, to work a minimum of three days a week in the office or on the road, starting from July. This decision is part of a broader shift in the company's approach to remote working, aligning with general business trends away from working from home.
